verbs.description: [ARG1: i-17] [V: closed] [ARGM-LOC: at state route 169] [ARGM-CAU: due to crash detour in place] two separate single - vehicle crashes forced the closure of southbound interstate 17 at state route 169 on tuesday evening adot said
